channel.title: [Neutral offensive] The Warlock
channel.description:
Neutral offensive Goal: live to see the blue dragon fall
**Passive one: Invisibility** Immune to visits at night when you do not leave your room
**Passive two: Corax's sight** You learn the names and classes of everyone who attempts to visit you (even if you were immune to visits that night)
**Day ability two: Distant Whispers** _(infinite uses)_ Your target will unknowingly have their messages hidden to everyone else for the rest of the day
**Night ability one: Infernal chains** _(4 uses)_ occupy your target tonight and the following night
**Night ability two: Portals** _(3 uses)_ Cause everyone visiting your target to be redirected to another of your choosing. Does not redirect occupy immune players. This does not count as a visit.
